name: Tipping Point Tavern
description:
The Tipping Point is an interactive experience where players control a character dealing with alcohol addiction as they help the character out with their addiction and have conversations talking about how and why addiction occurs. Mini-games have been designed in such a way to explain the more complex topics related to addiction in a way that's easy to follow and understand. 

TW: Alcohol/ Addiction 

CW: Drinking, Depiction of Alcohol 

Team Name: Stress Busting!

Team Members:
